_header: Of the graces that God hath thee sent
_description: Man’s answer to God at the judgment — three monorhyming lines in John Grimestone’s sermon notebook introduced ‘Oportet te reddere racionem’

NLS18721.Transcription:
Of þe graces þat god hat þe sentOf þe godis
                    þat god hat þe lent& of þi time hou it is
                    ispent
NLS18721.Editions:
Wilson,  Edward. 
             A Descriptive Index of the English Lyrics in John of Grimestone’s
                Preaching Book.
Medium Ævum Monographs
         n.s. 2. Oxford, 1973: 59.
